name: Outdated - Facebook Polygon
description:
[Outdated and Abandoned] Sorry, facebook constantly makes changes and I have decided to drop this project.

Originally created by yizle.com, named "Facebook 2015". Since he don't update for it and it did contain some bugs. I enhanced and fixed the bugs from original style.
additional_info:
-Hover over news feed on left column no longer light color highlight
-Now, chat box has dark theme.
-Fixed top bar bug
